column1: Adelard Took was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Adelard was the son of Flambard Took
column2: and had five children; three daughters and two sons. His sons were Reginard Took and Everard Took. They were all present at Bilbos Farewell Party in . The next morning
column3: he received an umbrella as a parting gift from Bilbo Baggins.

column1: Adelard (lit. noble-hard) comes from a Teutonic word meaning "resolute" or "courageous".
